Map023.Event[44].Page[0].list.message[0]: You search the barrel for anything useful...
Map023.Event[45].Page[0].list.message[0]: There is a fine chair sitting here...
Map023.Event[45].Page[0].list.message[1]: Its purpose is unknown. Maybe it's here just stored away?
Map023.Event[45].Page[1].list.message[0]: The chair is surprisingly comfy. You can relax here for a
Map023.Event[45].Page[1].list.message[1]: This is what it must feel like sitting on a throne.
Map023.Event[45].Page[1].list.message[2]: The idea lingers to your mind that you came to these dungeons
on your own free will. No one forced you to come here.
Map023.Event[45].Page[1].list.message[3]: You could have just slept late on that morning you embarked
on this macabre quest of yours.
Map023.Event[45].Page[1].list.message[4]: There are countless things you could be enjoying at this
very moment, but instead you sit in this chair surrounded
Map023.Event[45].Page[1].list.message[5]: Sitting here, knowing that the moment you get up, death
might be waiting you just around the corner.
Map023.Event[45].Page[1].list.message[6]: It's horrible to say the least.
